description: The REopt® web tool (formerly known as REopt Lite®) evaluates the economic viability of grid-connected solar photovoltaics (PV), wind and battery storage at a commercial site. It allows building owners to identify the system sizes and dispatch strategy that minimize the site's life cycle cost of energy. REopt Lite® also estimates the amount of time a PV and/or wind and battery system can sustain the site's critical load during a grid outage and allows the user the choice of optimizing for energy resilience. The REopt® web tool may be found here: https://reopt.nrel.gov/tool/.
name: REopt® web tool FKA: REopt Lite® [SWR-19-21]
